name: Common Utilities
description: Installs essential system utilities: network tools, system monitoring, text processing, and development utilities

installNetworkTools.description: Install network utilities (openssh-client, iproute2, net-tools, rsync)

installSystemTools.description: Install system monitoring tools (htop, lsof, procps, strace)

installTextTools.description: Install text processing tools (less, tree, ncdu, man-db)

installBashCompletion.description: Install bash-completion for enhanced shell completion
